author: Tabletop Minions
description:
Some tips - a few you probably don't expect - to help you get into miniature painting in 2025.

The Army Painter Fanatic Starter Paint Set: https://us.thearmypainter.com/products/warpaints-fanatic-starter-set
and use my code 'FactoryUncle5' at checkout to get 5% off of your entire order at http://www.thearmypainter.com - this is an affiliate link that helps to support the channel.

The cordless airbrush set is in my Amazon "Random Hobby Stuff" store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/tabletopminions/list/16X66NHBWN5V7?ref_=cm_sw_r_cp_ud_aipsflist_ZC27RYGW773TXDPJ6RMF 

Vince Venturella and I made another game! Check out Deth Wizards - miniatures-agnostic necromantic skirmish combat at http://www.dethwizardsgame.com

I'm a member of The Army Painter Factory Team - and I'm passing the savings on to you! Use code 'FactoryUncle5' at checkout to get 5% off of your entire order at http://www.thearmypainter.com or check my favorite Army Painter products at https://thearmypainter.com/tabletop-minio
title: Beginner Miniature PAINTING TIPS 2025 - Unexpected?
